alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 7:38PM CST until March 02 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Caldwell County in south central Texas... Southern Hays County in south central Texas... Central Guadalupe County in south central Texas... Bexar County in south central Texas... Comal County in south central Texas... * Until 845 PM CST. * At 737 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Woodcreek to near Spring Branch to near Bergheim to near Sea World, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, San Marcos, Schertz, Kyle, Seguin, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Wimberley, San Antonio Int Airport, Randolph AFB, Canyon Lake Dam, Stinson Municipal Airport, Canyon Lake, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch and Kirby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
